website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're young at heart, feeling nostalgic, or searching for the perfect gift for a special girl, this musical jewelry box won't disappoint.
pros: Pretty design with enchanting ballerina-themed artwork
Simple ballerina figurine twirls to the timeless Swan Lake melody
Metal hinges ensure that this jewelry box won't accidentally snap shut
cons: Designed for children, this jewelry box is unlikely to meet an adult’s practical needs, even if it does satisfy whimsical flights of fancy

customer_reviews.title: This is a horrible excuse of a jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: ***STOP! DO NOT BUY THIS! This is a horrible excuse of a jewelry box! It arrives in a clear ugly plastic bag, no box for product. The music and ballerina does not work. Believe me, the picture is much better than the product itself! I'm so disappointed with this! I purchased it for my granddaughters birthday and it arrives like this! Do not make my mistake people! Now, let's see how easy it will be to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morse-Zackery

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Item!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed at the condition this item arrived. The hinges on the lid were BOTH broken. I was expecting my niece to receive a new WOODEN music BOX, but instead she got a hard-cardboard box that was uneven on the corners. This item is not worth the money and I am seeking a reimbursement!
customer_reviews.author: VILLI_219

customer_reviews.title: winder not working out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the music box was broken right out of the box. The winder would not wind, therefore there was no music and the ballerina didn't turn. I bought it as a gift, so they were very disappointed when they opened it. Also,when I saw it, it is made out of a very thick and sturdy cardboard, covered with paper decoration. It's very cute and looks like the picture, but considering the price, I was expecting more. I had to return it because of it not working and didn't want to take the chance on a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 days. The gears attached to ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 days. The gears attached to gear spring in box are cheap plastic that was out of tolerance. There was no way of fixing the issue without destroying the misic box.
customer_reviews.author: jcorliss

customer_reviews.title: my daughter's favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's favorite Christmas present. It is well made and sturdy, yet beautiful. She loves all of the different compartments, the Swan Lake song, and dancing ballerina. The drawers are made so they stop once fully opened and won't fall out. Update: a year and a half later, this has proven to be very durable. It looks like new even though my child plays with it and carts it around often. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I usually trust Amazons Best Seller but not in this case
customer_reviews.text: This was $30. It’s 6” x 4” and made of cardboard. Very low quality. I usually trust Amazons Best Seller but not in this case. I’ll be sending it back tomorrow . Many times I will donate items rather than sending them back but there’s no way I’d donate this !
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Carey

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed, my daughter was looking forward to this
customer_reviews.text: the winding thing just fell off, so disappointed, my daughter was looking forward to this, ruined our birthday celebration :( had to return the item, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Edmund J Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday present for my daughter. All of her friends at the party loved it and I had other moms texting me asking where it got it. It has little drawers, big drawers, a mirror, dancing ballerina and a wind up thing in the back. The music is very lovely and the kids danced to it for hours (and the sound was nice for adults as well, not annoying like some music toys).
customer_reviews.author: Kaden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my twin girls for Christmas and they are over the moon about them. They are 3 and have fallen in love with them, so much so, they carry them around with them where ever they go. They love to wind them up and watch the adorable ballerina twirling around to swan lake 🎶🎵
customer_reviews.author: Ronman70z

customer_reviews.title: It's so beautiful and of course she loves it because it's pretty
customer_reviews.text: It came slightly damaged. It is cardboard and the corner was slightly crushed from shipping, I guess. But I gave it to my daughter anyway. When she opened it up, the lid ripped off completely. It's so beautiful and of course she loves it because it's pretty, plays beautiful music and has lots of hidden drawers. But it's so poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this jewelry box. It's "from Santa" so it was important to me that it be perfect for my 8 year old. Not huge but nice size, crisp music tune, very pretty design. Soda can to help with size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful first jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful first jewelry box. This is made from a hard cardboard material but it is very sturdy and decorated beautifully. My daughter loves the dancer and the music which start automatically when you open the lid. There are nice little drawers for the small amount of jewelry my daughter has. A good starter box for younger girls.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Slight defect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece for Christmas. She did like it and it worked for the most part. The problem was the back of the box was ripped upon when she got it out of the package. It nothing a little supper glue won't fix. I would give it 5 stars for what it is and the price if it wasn't for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse, You're the Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Warehouse "damaged" version of this item, hoping it would be "decent" enough that my daughter would still enjoy it for a birthday present... I cannot even find any defects! Seriously, it's perfect. My daughter LOVES it. It taught her the word "ballerina!" She loves putting all her special treasures inside and making the ballerina dance. It's a very sweet little jewelry box for a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn H.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful jewelry box made a little girls dream come true! It is well made. The music plays at a good level, not to loud or too soft. The child has played a lot with this box and it holds up to the 3 year old. It is as pretty as pictured online. It was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, well made, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Our grandaughter, who just turned 5 years old, loved this birthday present. It was recieved in excellent condition. The music box works well and the doll is lovely. Lots of little drawers for her jewelry and other treasures. Very nice product at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little musical jewelry box!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little musical jewelry box! I love the multiple drawers for storage. The box itself is of high quality and it made our granddaughter very happy! It is very nice to have so many choices of box design, too. We got the unicorn box for her younger sister, they were both tickled to play their boxes together side by side!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Drawers to small
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty and my 5yo really likes it, but it actually doesn’t hold much. The drawers a really small and none of them will fit her hard plastic bracelets and large bead necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl is so happy. She earned this by going to bed by herself for a certain period of time. When she got this, she was so excited. She absolutely loves it, and it will last for a long time. This would make an awesome gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Ballerina Box with secret drawers
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves boxes and I wanted to get her something sentimental and I’m so glad I found this one because she loves it. It’s so well made, not cardboard. She likes all the little drawers so she can hide stuff from her little sister 💕
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: BALLERINA TREASURE MUSIC BOX
customer_reviews.text: Darling jewelry box for a 4-year-old's "jewels" and trinkets. The melody is lovely and the little ballerina pops up when lid is opened. The colors are as pretty as shown in picture, and the ballerina is holding up wonderfully as little fingers open and shut the lid over and over and over! An adorable and fun purchase!
customer_reviews.author: shopper66

customer_reviews.title: good toy
customer_reviews.text: good jewelry box for the little ones. the music is relaxing, you wind it from the back and it plays for a long time. the drawers that open are a little flimsy, but they work, probably wont put actual jewelry in this at all. just to look and "play" with. not a real jewelry box, per se, but a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old daughter as a special mommy to daughter birthday gift and I don’t know who loves it more... me or her!!?? We both love the little musical tune it plays and that the drawers can’t come completely out so they can’t get lost. Great quality... would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to one of my young nieces for Christmas. I was looking for something just different than dolls. I seem to have made the right choice because she really loved it. It's well build and it's just cute. So if you're not sure what to get for a young girl as a present than you can't go wrong with this Music Box. Highly recommend it :)
customer_reviews.author: Pyrosclaw

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of the one I had in the 60's.
customer_reviews.text: An adorable gift for my granddaughter. This little jewelry box has fun drawers that reminded me of secret compartments... which all little girls love. She is 7 years old and this is the perfect size to contain her treasures. The music that plays when it's open makes my little sweetie dance just like the ballerina in the box.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamric

customer_reviews.title: Nice Song, Quality Not So Good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this jewelry box for my girly-girl 6 year old God daughter. I had a musical jewelry box growing up and remember it being one of my favorite gifts. I am not too pleased with the quality of the box. Looks kinda like printed paper glued over cardboard. The side drawers won't stay in, and keep sliding out even when the jewelry box is on a level surface. I do love the ballet song that plays though.
customer_reviews.author: B Mc

customer_reviews.title: 5-year old girl loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old niece loved it - and that's what counted. It didn't seem sturdy enough to hold up to use by a child this age but she hasn't broken it yet and she's had it for nearly two months.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it but it was somewhat cheaply made. I feel like this product was made in a sweatshop somewhere but it plays a pleasent song and it is somewhat smaller than I was thinking it would be but I guess you get what you pay for. I gave it 4 stars because it works for what I needed it for and my niece loves it, especially the little hidden side drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable music/ jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this box. She was so excited when she opened it and now keeps all of her jewelry and other treasures in the box. I was excited because it reminded me of the music/ jewelry box I had when I was her age (5 years old) - but it is actually much cooler than my old one - because it has all of these neat drawers for "hidden treasures". It's pretty sturdy for the use it was created for (holding jewelry and looking pretty) - but wouldn't hold up to any rough play so make sure your daughter is old enough to understand what it is for. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: ColoMomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Quality a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little jewelry box, but extremely disappointed that when my daughter opened the box Christmas morning and lifted the top, the dancing ballerina's upper body broke off (literally popped up and out of box)...so now we are left with a waist down ballerina and the need to try and repair with super glue because there is no way she will let it go to be returned. Obviously ours is defective or quality is not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Red Dog

customer_reviews.title: DARLING GIFT FOR A LITTLE GIRL
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY GREAT NIECE FOR CHRISTMAS, SO DON'T KNOW ABOUT THE STURDINESS YET, BUT I AM HOPING IT IS. SHE IS TAKING BALLET SO I THINK SHE WILL LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: earrings or fine chains will fit easily
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an inexpensive jewelry box for a child this fits the bill. It has the drawers, has the music and the ballerina when you open the box. It is small though, you will not fit a lot, if any chunky large beaded jewelry in here. However, small rings, earrings or fine chains will fit easily. Every once in awhile it can be difficult for my 4 year old to open the drawers, they get stuck, and I have to straighten them out for her. There are 5 openings, the 4 shown there and then a bottom opening in the back.
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made treasure box.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my granddaughter. I was disappointed that the treasure box was so poorly made. It seems to be made of cardboard. The main compartment where the ballerina is is very cheaply made. The little drawers around the box are tiny and difficult to get anything out of the drawer. I order another treasure box made of wood for the same price, much better value.
customer_reviews.author: DebinNC

customer_reviews.title: Every Girl Needs One
customer_reviews.text: My four year-old granddaughter is enjoying this jewelry box very much. There are many compartments for her jewelry and the ballerina and music is a wonderful finishing touch.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my daughter as Christmas present from ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter as Christmas present from Santa. One of the drawers stuck and wouldn’t open. The ballerina wasn’t spinning either. Exchanged it since I couldn’t return a present from Santa. But I would have returned instead if not bc of Santa. Not impressed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is so in love with this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old daughter and she is just over the moon in love with it. She loves all the little compartments and the spinning ballerina. Very glad I chose this for her Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jewelry box for my little ballet dancer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter’s 4th birthday, since she started taking ballet classes and loves everything ballet. She was absolutely delighted with the music and the little ballet dancer, as well as all the little compartments for her special jewelry. I also hid a little butterfly necklace in one of the drawers, which she discovered while checking them all out!
customer_reviews.author: Nazmis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jewelry box as a gift for my granddaughter's fifth birthday. She is enchanted with it. It may be a little overpriced but she really likes it so it is fine. It is exactly as described in ad and came well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: She loved it! She has had it and played with ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our granddaughter for her birthday. She loved it! She has had it and played with it for several months now, and it has held up really well. I have been very pleased with the quality of construction of this little jewelry box. And it is very cute to boot.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as replacement for less expensive ones as birthday gifts for my 4 & 5 yr. old granddaughters. Wish I had bought these first so cute and hold up to kids opening and closing. They love them!
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie of 8

customer_reviews.title: Pink is washed out.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased from the warehouse. The color is not a pretty pink. The corners are subject to wear. Try Walmart for a nicer quality musical jewelry box.
customer_reviews.author: BAMOR

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece who was turning 4 and she LOVES it! I took it out of the packaging and put some jewelry in each drawer. It was a big hit. It was very nice looking and came on time and perfect looking. The music plays great, and the little ballerina was great
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Noe

customer_reviews.title: A Little Girl's Dream
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old granddaughter wanted a jewelry box for her trinkets and treasures. I spent a great deal of time and effort researching suitable choices and then let her Mama, my daughter, make the final choice. We are all three happy with this Ballerina Music Box, the three-year-old most of all. I would have preferred a somewhat more substantial box, but we wanted something colorful with ballerinas. That really narrowed our choices. And the important point is that the child loves and appreciates her gift.
customer_reviews.author: Paying Attention to the Actual Words

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: It was my granddaughter’s favorite gift! She loves the ballerina and all the drawers! It’s boxed beautifully to give as a gift and it’s just the sweetest jewelry box.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my granddaughter!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old granddaughter. She is over the moon about her new jewelry box. We both like the many different compartments. She especially like the drawer at the back so she “can hide her special stuff from her little brother!!
customer_reviews.author: Debels62

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!! :(
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could! It's not amazon's fault, but the third party. I received something totally different, I got A toy horse saddle stand instead of this music box which I had ordered for my niece's birthday. But the weird thing Is that on the back of the package holding The toy horse saddle had a label with a UPC code and stated enchantment ballerina music box, guess that person was not doing their job cause clearly it was not a music box! I contacted amazon right away and they gave me a full refund...thanks amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Metaphor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box, Misleading Title
customer_reviews.text: The box overall isn't terrible, though we purchased with the belief that "it would last for years"...which it will not. It is made of a heavy cardboard like material and will be lucky to survive my 5-year old for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jewelry box for a little girl as a Christmas gift. It' s very sturdy and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Jewerly box
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter Juliet asked for a Music Box with a Ballerina for Christmas. This box was just the ticket! Juliet was thrilled when she opened her gift and still a month later is enchanted by the music and the spin of the little ballerina. Nicely made and seems strong though we have warned Juliet it is not a toy. Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty enough for a princess
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 7 year old granddaughter for Christmas. She is a dancer, so I am sure she will love the jewelry box I has lots of room for a little girls jewelry
customer_reviews.author: JudyByJudy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this. Plenty of compartments to store her jewelry. She loves the ballerina. She is 8
customer_reviews.author: DpbPdx

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but small
customer_reviews.text: This ballerina box is very cute. I know the measurements are on the description but the drawers all around it are very small you can barely fit any jewelry. It's beautiful and the music box works so it's a nice little touch for a girl's room. But it is not very practical as a jewelry box
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Pappadia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 ur old niece. I like the little compartments on the side to hold special treasures. There’s sufficient space for earrings, small bottles of nail polish, and my niece really likes the ballerina too.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth kc wang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. A decently large size for a little girl
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. A decently large size for a little girl, with multiple compartments popping out everywhere. The rotating ballerina is lovely, and the tone of the chimes is soft but nice. The recipient was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: PATTI F BUCKWALTER

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small....
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and music box plays. But, the drawers are very small. Neclaces and bracelets fits, but hopefully you don't have a ton! My daughters end up having a different box dedicated to jewelry on top of the jewelry box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Alspach

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Ballerina
customer_reviews.text: Such a sweet jewelry box - reminds me of the one I had when I was little! My 5 year old daughter loves all of the little compartments but the twirling ballerina is her favorite. Plenty of room for all her little trinkets, but I wouldn't recommend putting necklaces inside - too easily tangled. Perfect for earrings, pins and small bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our Granddaughter for Christmas per her special request. It was delivered with a protective wrapping so we did not test it before we had the gift delivered out of our State. Unfortunately, when the box was wound up, the ballerina did not spin or the music play. Very disappointing. Because of logistics we will not return. I would not trust a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no storage
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and cute. Gifted to my 4 year old for her birthday. Doesn't hold much jewelry and her 2 year old brother broke it pretty easily. For a little girl who is into ballerinas and jewelry I'd recommend finding something something that holds more and is more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of the one I had growing up. Just right for a little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: it was okay but its for a little girl inside is very small and can't fit much in it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Happy granddaughter - great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little gift for a 3year old. Although it's not solid wood, it is very well constructed and the music box seems well made and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: AjAA

customer_reviews.title: Precious for a little girl.
customer_reviews.text: Precious. I was given something similar when I was a little girl and still have it. So when I saw this one I thought it would be great to give my 6 year old granddaughter. She loves it! Music plays clear while the little ballerina turns. All the small drawers are prefect for a little girls treasured items.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy G

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice recital gift. Will last longer than the usual flowers. Grand daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm also amazed that I cannot find a ballerina with dark hair
customer_reviews.text: I do believe this music box is designed for a very young child, no older than 5 or 6. It is a lot smaller than I had expected; I should've paid more attention to it's dimensions. The packaging it arrived in was damaged, making it look cheap to present as a gift. I will have to think of a way to make it look more presentable as I am giving it to an 8 year old. I'm also amazed that I cannot find a ballerina with dark hair...all of them have blonde hair. The pic on this box clearly has darker hair. It's too late for me to return it so it will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Turtles

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: well made, great price, fast delivery. love all the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Score for Grandma!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a purple one for my other grand daughter and both of my grand daughters were enchanted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Soozbie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had believed the other reviews- the quality is way too cheap for its price. There is no also way to open the packaging to check for damage as it cannot be put back and presented. Not happy as the party is tomorrow and I am stuck looking for another gift!
customer_reviews.author: TMAT

customer_reviews.title: Enchantment jewelry case has my granddaughter dreaming of being a famous ballerina  !
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my young granddaughter who loved it and immediately started dancing to the twirling ballerina in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Young

customer_reviews.title: Will pass down to 5 year old granddaughter & start ...
customer_reviews.text: Will pass down to 5 year old granddaughter & start our own traditional. From Grandma to all the granddaughters here on out. (Love you Bri-Onna Stormee Hardy).
customer_reviews.author: Dejournettecooper

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters loved it. All the little compartments are fun to ...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters loved it. All the little compartments are fun to find and use. Nice size for a 5 and 8 year old. Pretty cheaply made though. Cardboard/paper and plastic ballerina. However the price was right for what it was.
customer_reviews.author: daylingrace

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for my 5 yo daughter who loves ballet. Size is bigger than expected! Fast delivery with smooth transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large but not heavy. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3 yr old for her birthday. She was very impressed with it!!! It has multiple drawers (easy to open/close, don't stick) and the ballerina plays beautiful music while she spins. She said "it's so golden!!!" She gives it 6 stars. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ballerina Music Box
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this. I did a little research before buying, and this was one of the nicest boxes for the price. It is adorable with lots of drawers. It was her favorite this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: This is truly adorable. Worth the money and so perfect for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Zana Moss

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I never had a music box until my husband bought me this for Mother’s Day
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Or christine

customer_reviews.title: Your child Grand-daughter will love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old autistic grand-daughter absolutely LOVED this jewelry box! Every little girl should have at lease one pop-up ballerina jewelry box, it's kind of like having an EZ-Bake Oven when I was a girl.
customer_reviews.author: shepardess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a three-year-old who loves ballerinas and jewelry.
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old granddaughter and two-year-old grandson were both mesmerized by the ballerina and the music from the box. My granddaughter was able to put her new jewelry inside but could not stop watching the ballerina. Beautiful colorful solid gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of rubbish, got it out of ...
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of rubbish, got it out of the box and it did not play music and the ballerina did not turn. This was a christmas gift and now its too late to order another one to try, not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Quality and space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a little girl. Good quality and sweet music. Plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Burleson

customer_reviews.title: 8yr old
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, but for an 8yr old it's fine. She likes it and that's all that matters
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Voyles

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet gift for a little girl. Bought it for my granddaughter. It's quite small which is the only negative about it. Otherwise, room for necklace, bracelet, and a ring or two.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Music Box
customer_reviews.text: This music box is perfect. It's very pretty and plays beautiful music. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene D. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old niece's birthday to put on her new wooden vanity. It came perfectly packaged with no damage. My niece loves it and says the ballerina is beautiful. I bought her a very expensive ballerina jewelry box a few years ago but she was to young for it and it ended up broken. Although this is not expensive it is just perfect for her age.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very suitable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box for my almost 4-year old daughter. I opened the box to wrap it for Christmas and I'm very impressed with the quality of the box. I like that the drawers are each side of the box. There is at least one drawer on each side. The music is not too loud and winding is quite easy which was a concern for me. Previous reviewers have commented on the size of the box. It is the perfect size for a little girl. It will hold just enough 'jewellery' to make them feel they have a lot of treasures. I would purchase this item again and am looking forward to seeing it in use.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!

She already has it stuffed full of jewelry, she carries it around with her and plays with it a lot, and this box has held up to everything. She loves to wind it up and listen to it, watching the ballerina twirl. No problems at all-- I feel this product exceeded my expectations.

The music is charming, and I'm glad I bought this gift for her.

product_meta.title: Enchantmints Ballerina Musical Jewelry Box, "Swan Lake" Ballerinas, 4 Drawers
product_meta.description:
Decorated with beautiful ballerina artwork, this musical treasure box is perfect for the dance lover! Box has a hinged top with interior mirror, inside compartment, twirling ballerina figurine, and a lovely velvet-flocked paper lining. Earrings, bracelets, charms and sachets are all safe and comfortable inside any of the four drawers: one on the front, one on the back, and two on the sides. Wind it up to hear it play “Swan Lake.”

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Enchantmints’ mission is to create imaginative designs that provide joy for children and parents alike. Combining beautiful artwork in lovely washes of color with beloved musical tunes, each piece is an artistic treat for the eyes and ears! Designed to be cherished for years to come, musical treasure boxes are just right for keeping life’s treasures and precious mementos.
feature_bullets: Large bottom drawer and two tiny side drawers hold jewelry and other treasures.
Music box plays "Swan Lake" with a twirling ballerina figurine.
Excellent for tiny treasures. MATERIAL: Highest quality MDF laminated with printed paper.
Part of the Enchantments Ballet Collection.
